documentation.text: @dev Constructor, takes initial and final rates of tokens received per wei contributed.

The base rate function is overridden to revert, since this crowdsale doesn't use it, and
 all calls to it are a mistake.

documentation.text: @dev Constructor, takes initial and final rates of tokens received per wei contributed.

The base rate function is overridden to revert, since this crowdsale doesn't use it, and
 all calls to it are a mistake.

devdoc.details: Extension of Crowdsale contract that increases the price of tokens linearly in time. Note that what should be provided to the constructor is the initial and final _rates_, that is, the amount of tokens per wei contributed. Thus, the initial rate must be greater than the final rate.

buyTokens(address).details: low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE*** This function has a non-reentrancy guard, so it shouldn't be called by another `nonReentrant` function.

constructor.details: Constructor, takes initial and final rates of tokens received per wei contributed.

getCurrentRate().details: Returns the rate of tokens per wei at the present time. Note that, as price _increases_ with time, the rate _decreases_.

returns._0: The number of tokens a buyer gets per wei at a given time

hasClosed().details: Checks whether the period in which the crowdsale is open has already elapsed.

returns._0: true if the crowdsale is open, false otherwise.
the address where funds are collected.

devdoc.title: IncreasingPriceCrowdsale

rate().notice: The base rate function is overridden to revert, since this crowdsale doesn't use it, and all calls to it are a mistake.
